GapFillInput.Title: Past simple negative
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type didn’t, weren’t or wasn’t into each gap.

Content.Question:
1. I didn't go skiing last year.
2. David and I weren't at the beach last weekend.
3. The painter wasn't at the art gallery.
4. Mia and Petra didn't go to a restaurant last night.
5. You didn't go swimming this morning.
6. They weren't at the museum.
7. Ana wasn't on the boat.
8. We didn't go for a walk yesterday.
9. I didn't eat any breakfast this morning.
10. You weren't on the platform at the station.
